name: Super ULTRA Dungeon DX
description:
Controls:

Make SURE caps lock is OFF!

A -> Z

B -> X

Start -> Start

Select -> Shift

D-Pad -> Arrow Keys

Demo V0.01

Dev Notes:

- Only one character 

- 2 enemy types

-1 boss enemy

- Only 3 rooms

Game Notes:

- B button to attack

- the chest dropped by skeletons drops one of 3 random items

Future Plans:

- Full Main Menu Functionality

- More rooms / Random rooms / Enemies rooms 

- Shop to buy items during runs with the gold you earn from enemies

- Better pixel art for scenes

- And more!

Feedback Much Appreciated  ! ! !
